mapper.select: select id, name, app_id as appId, parent_id as parentId, lft, rht from rdm_app_catalog where id = #{value}

select id,
(select count(1) from rdm_app_catalog x where x.parent_id = id) as childrenCount,
name, app_id as appId, parent_id as parentId, lft, rht from rdm_app_catalog where app_id = #{appId}
and parent_id = 0 or parent_id is null
and parent_id != 0 and parent_id is not null
order by lft

select id, app_id as appId, type, name, label, description, is_required AS isRequired, sort, is_private AS isPrivate, config AS configStr, is_active AS isActive FROM rdm_app_attr where app_id = #{value} order by sort
select id, app_id as appId, type, name, label, description, is_required AS isRequired, sort, is_private AS isPrivate, config AS configStr, is_active AS isActive FROM rdm_app_attr where id = #{value}

select rasr.id as id, rasr.from_status_id as fromStatusId, rasr.to_status_id as toStatusId, rasr.app_id as appId, fras.name as fromStatusName, fras.label as fromStatusLabel, fras.color as fromStatusColor, tras.name as toStatusName, tras.label as toStatusLabel, tras.color as toStatusColor, rasr.config as configStr from rdm_app_status_rel rasr join rdm_app_status fras on rasr.from_status_id = fras.id join rdm_app_status tras on rasr.to_status_id = tras.id where rasr.app_id = #{value}
select id, app_id as appId, name, label, sort, color, is_start as isStart, is_end as isEnd FROM rdm_app_status WHERE id = #{value}

select a.id, a.app_type as appType, a.project_id AS projectId, a.sort, b.id as attrId, b.type as attrType, b.name as attrName, b.label as attrLabel, b.description as attrDescription, b.is_required as attrIsRequired, b.sort as attrSort, b.is_private as attrIsPrivate, b.config as attrConfigStr from rdm_app a left join rdm_app_attr b on a.id = b.app_id where a.id = #{value} order by b.sort

select a.id, a.app_type as appType, a.project_id AS projectId, a.sort, b.id as attrId, b.type as attrType, b.name as attrName, b.label as attrLabel, b.description as attrDescription, b.is_required as attrIsRequired, b.sort as attrSort, b.is_private as attrIsPrivate, b.config as attrConfigStr from rdm_app a left join rdm_app_attr b on a.id = b.app_id where a.project_id = #{value} order by a.sort, b.sort
mapper.insert: insert ignore into rdm_app_status_rel (id, app_id, from_status_id, to_status_id) values (#{id}, #{appId}, #{fromStatusId}, #{toStatusId})
insert into rdm_app_catalog (id, name, app_id, parent_id) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{appId}, #{parentId})
insert into rdm_app_status (id, app_id, name, label, sort, color) values (#{id}, #{appId}, #{name}, #{label}, #{sort}, #{color})
mapper.update: update rdm_app_attr set name = #{name}, label = #{label}, description =#{description}, is_required = #{isRequired}, sort = #{sort}, config = #{configStr}, is_active = #{isActive} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert rdm_app (id, app_type, project_id, sort) values (#{id}, #{type}, #{projectId}, #{sort})

insert into rdm_app_attr (id, app_id, type, name, label, description, is_required, sort, is_private, config, is_active) values (#{id}, #{appId}, #{type}, #{name}, #{label}, #{description}, #{isRequired}, #{sort}, #{isPrivate}, #{configStr}, #{isActive})
mapper.delete: DELETE a,b,c,d,e FROM rdm_app a left join rdm_app_attr b on a.id = b.app_id left join rdm_app_priority c on a.id = c.app_id left join rdm_app_status d on a.id = d.app_id left join rdm_app_status_rel e on a.id = e.app_id where a.id = #{value}
DELETE a,b,c FROM rdm_app_status a LEFT JOIN rdm_app_status_rel b ON a.id = b.from_status_id LEFT JOIN rdm_app_status_rel c ON a.id = c.to_status_id WHERE a.id = #{value}
